comments:

things, so I'm not sure what action caused this exception.

I've seen the same exception in the WTP 0.7.1 maintenance release on Linux. I'm also getting a very similar exception everytime I try to export my project to a WAR:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.resources.VirtualComponent.getReferences(VirtualComponent.java:187)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.archive.operations.J2EEArtifactExportOperation.gatherDependentProjects(J2EEArtifactExportOperation.java:199)

The component type is removed in WTP 1.0.1.
